title: Number of students in upper secondary education in Denmark 2008 to 2018
summary: In 2018 and 2018 , most Danes were never married ; the number of never married inhabitants was around 2.8 million in the fourth quarter of 2018 . By contrast , among all Danes , the fewest were divorced . In general , the number of divorces between different sexes fluctuated in recent years , peaking in 2014 at about 19 thousand divorces .
gold: The statistic shows the number of students in upper secondary education in Denmark from 2008 to 2018 . The number increased from about 118 thousand upper secondary education students in 2008 to about 149 thousand students in 2018 .
